analysis.description:
ContractFPC.approvedInvestorList (/unique_chucks/45/0x5986b5d6d6f49f31fb9cca27d92a04e1cbb95a21.sol#37-40) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- isApprovedInvestor (/unique_chucks/45/0x5986b5d6d6f49f31fb9cca27d92a04e1cbb95a21.sol#99-105)

ContractFPC.deposit (/unique_chucks/45/0x5986b5d6d6f49f31fb9cca27d92a04e1cbb95a21.sol#40-44) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- getDeposit (/unique_chucks/45/0x5986b5d6d6f49f31fb9cca27d92a04e1cbb95a21.sol#110-116)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/45/0x5986b5d6d6f49f31fb9cca27d92a04e1cbb95a21.sol:
	Contract ContractFPC has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/45/0x5986b5d6d6f49f31fb9cca27d92a04e1cbb95a21.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/45/0x5986b5d6d6f49f31fb9cca27d92a04e1cbb95a21.sol:
